statements: SELECT record_id, record_type, record_description, last_updated FROM compliance_records WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT record_description, record_type FROM compliance_records WHERE record_type = 'Financial';
SELECT record_id, record_description, last_updated, record_type FROM compliance_records ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE record_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT record_id, record_description FROM compliance_records WHERE record_type = 'Audit' ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE record_description LIKE '%important%'
SELECT record_id, record_description, last_updated FROM compliance_records WHERE record_type = 'Incident'
SELECT record_type, COUNT(record_id) AS total_records FROM compliance_records GROUP BY record_type ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT * FROM compliance_records ORDER BY record_id ASC
SELECT * FROM compliance_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT record_title, record_description FROM compliance_records WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT document_title FROM legal_documents WHERE document_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_content FROM legal_documents WHERE document_id = 3;
SELECT record_id, record_title, record_date FROM compliance_records ORDER BY record_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE record_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT record_title, record_date FROM compliance_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, record_title, record_description FROM compliance_records JOIN legal_documents ON compliance_records.record_id = legal_documents.document_id WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT document_title, document_date FROM legal_documents ORDER BY document_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records;
SELECT record_name, record_description FROM compliance_records;
SELECT record_id, record_name, record_date FROM compliance_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, document_type, document_content FROM legal_documents;
SELECT manual_id, manual_name FROM policy_manuals;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT manual_name, LENGTH(manual_content) AS content_length FROM policy_manuals WHERE content_length > 1000;
SELECT MAX(record_date) FROM compliance_records WHERE record_name LIKE 'Quarterly%';
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(document_content)) AS avg_content_length FROM legal_documents;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records;
SELECT record_name, record_date FROM compliance_records WHERE record_type='Type1';
SELECT record_id, record_name, record_date FROM compliance_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT manual_title, manual_content FROM policy_manuals WHERE manual_category='CategoryA';
SELECT document_name FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type='Type2' LIMIT 3;
SELECT record_name, record_date FROM compliance_records WHERE record_type='Regulatory' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM compliance_records;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type='Policy' AND document_name LIKE '%privacy%';
SELECT manual_title, manual_category, LENGTH(manual_content) AS content_length FROM policy_manuals WHERE manual_category='HR Policies' ORDER BY content_length DESC;
SELECT purpose_name, LENGTH(purpose_description) AS description_length FROM regulatory_purposes WHERE description_length > 100 ORDER BY purpose_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecords;
SELECT record_name, record_date FROM ComplianceRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT manual_name, last_updated FROM PolicyManuals WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT record_name, record_description FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE id = 1;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_type = 'Contract';
SELECT manual_name, last_updated FROM PolicyManuals WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM Departments WHERE department_head IS NOT NULL;
